ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.cmput301w16t16.glamorousborrowingwhaleapp.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Martina on 16-03-10. Holds the current + another user so it can be referenced throughout the app. This function is called very often to retrieve user information and performs all the calls to ElasticSearch related to Users.
    Author:
    Martina
    See Also:
    ElasticSearch
